onlylive.label: Only when live
onlylive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

command.label: Command Name
command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

ignoreredeem.label: make rewardnames the command
ignoreredeem.tooltip: Skip over using the command above and instead use !rewardname as the command

usage.label: Usage
usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

stf.label: Save To File
stf.tooltip: If enabled all redeems will be saved to file!

textline.label: Save to file format
textline.tooltip:
Format of lines saved to the textfile upon successful redeem. 
{0} = user 
{1} = Reward
{2} = Reward cost
{3} = currencyname
{4} = Date & Time
{5} = 2nd word after command
{6} = the entire message that triggered the reward

notenough.value: {0} -> you don't have the {1} {2} required to redeem this reward.
notenough.label: Not Enough Points Response
notenough.tooltip:
Response when user doesn't have enough currency. 
{0} = user 
{1} = redeem cost
{2} = currencyname
{3} = user points

notavailable.label: Not Available Response
notavailable.tooltip:
Response when user tries to redeem a reward that isn't available 
{0} = user 
{1} = reward user tried to redeem

info.value: {0} -> you have to define a reward to redeem!
info.label: Info Response
info.tooltip:
Response when user doesn't specify what reward to redeem 
{0} = user

listbase.label: List message
listbase.tooltip: The message shown before listing the rewards when using !redeem list

notperm.value: {0} -> you don't have permission to redeem this reward. permission is: [{1} / {2}]
notperm.label: Not Permitted
notperm.tooltip:
message to send when the user permission doesn't match reward permission 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = Info

listcost.label: Show prices in list
listcost.tooltip: Show prices for the rewards available to redeem when using !redeem list

oncooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
oncooldown.label: cooldown Response
oncooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

onusercooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
onusercooldown.label: user cooldown Response
onusercooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

castercd.label: Caster ignores cooldown
castercd.tooltip: If checked the broadcaster ignore cooldowns!

r1.label: Reward Name
r1.tooltip: Name used to redeem this reward, one word only!

r1sm.label: Send Chat message
r1sm.tooltip: Send chat message upon successful redeem.

r1message.value: {0} spent {1} {2} to redeem a follow on Stream
r1message.label: Chat response
r1message.tooltip:
message sent upon successfully redeeming a reward 
{0} = user 
{1} = cost
{2} = currencyname
{3} = Parameter2 (first one after reward name)

r1sound.label: soundfile
r1sound.tooltip:
soundfile including fileformat. 
Example: test.mp3 
The soundfile must be in the sounds folder!

r1giflink.label: Gif Link
r1giflink.tooltip: Link to the gif to show in the index.html

r1duration.label: GIF duration
r1duration.tooltip: duration of GIF showed on screen

r1text.label: Alert text
r1text.tooltip:
text shown below the gif on the alert! Leave empty to disable text 
{0} = username 
{1} = redeem cost 
{2} = redeem name

r1permission.label: permission level
r1permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

r1permissioninfo.label: permission level info
r1permissioninfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

openFolder.label: Locate Index.html
openFolder.tooltip: Opens the folder containing index.html used for overlay in OBS or Xsplit

OpenRedeems.label: Open Redeems File
OpenRedeems.tooltip: Opens the file containing all successful redeems

ResetRedeems.label: Reset Redeems File
ResetRedeems.tooltip: Resets the file containing all successful redeems
